k.ylo.ph

endless seashore

FFmpeg gained several audio filters recently, including sinusoidal amplitude modulation and a colored noise source. I guess that means that everyone with FFmpeg installed on their system can now generate endless seashore sounds. This is important work.

ffplay -f lavfi -i anoisesrc=colour=brown -af tremolo=f=0.1:d=0.9

  • signal hacking and low-level programming
